message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,100,000.  I believe this is a fair starting point for us to negotiate a mutually beneficial deal.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,050,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is truly significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,075,000. This reflects the value it holds and ensures a fair deal for both of us.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,025,000 for the product.
